Module: stormpath

This is the Stormpath module, you must require this in your application if you wish to use the Stormpth Node SDK.

Source:
stormpath.js

Example

var stormpath = require('stormpath');

Members

<static> Client

Create a new client instance.

Source:
stormpath.js
Example
var client = new stormpath.Client();
